title: Ticket #2349: CMS glidein collector crashed
description:

08/03/11 13:05:52 ZKM: 1: attempting to map '/DC=org/DC=doegrids/OU=Services/CN=uscmspilot08/glidein-1.t2.ucsd.edu'
08/03/11 13:05:52 ZKM: 2: mapret: 0 included_voms: 0 canonical_user: glidein08
08/03/11 13:05:52 ZKM: successful mapping to glidein08
